answers.answer: First and foremost how is your control and management of your diabetes? Have you seen a doctor and been tested for GERD [Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease]? Sorry, but there's not much in your post to work with as your post is more of a comment than a question on diabetes. Might try posting on the Gastroenterology/Digestive Disorder forums for comments more specific to acid reflux.

question: I have acid reflux and every time this acts up I get this taste and it taste like yeast.
title: acid reflux
